snippet.title: Longplay of Rayman 2: The Great Escape
snippet.description:
Longplay of Rayman 2: The Great Escape, played as the NTSC version on the Dreamcast. This game's version was released on Mar. 21st, 2000. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Main menu
0:02:11 - Prologue
0:06:31 - The Woods of Light
0:12:32 - The Fairy Glade
0:36:26 - The Marshes of Awakening
0:40:35 - The Bayou
0:48:45 - The Sanctuary of Water and Ice
0:59:59 - The Menhir Hills
1:07:41 - The Cave of Bad Dreams
1:30:19 - The Canopy
1:42:19 - Whale Bay
1:57:15 - The Sanctuary of Stone and Fire
2:28:36 - The Echoing Caves
2:39:28 - The Precipice
2:48:34 - Bonus stage (no success tho)
2:50:52 - The Top of the World
3:00:24 - The Walk of Power
3:04:03 - The Sanctuary of Rock and Lava
3:15:22 - Beneath The Sanctuary of Rock and Lava
3:27:43 - The Tomb of the Ancients
3:44:31 - The Iron Mountain
4:03:17 - The Prison Ship
4:11:03 - The Crow’s Nest (Final boss)
4:19:53 - Ending and Credits

By: nikodem123asdf
